column5: Anyone have any good resources on purchasing Dardevle lures? Been looking on different websites and haven't seen any prices that were lower than brand new at BP/Cabelas. Would not mind "used" ones as long as they are in fair condition.
Eppinger gives a volume discount if you buy direct. Not sure if that helps you or not.If you visit their location I have heard you can get some good deals. So if you're ever in the neighbourhood...
Dick's has a 20% off sale in this Sunday's ad's. Bill

How much can you possibly save? Find a local sport shop that takes care of their customers and buy some daredevils.The independant bait shops that are open long hours for your convenience need to make a profit too. I try do do my business so that my money stays local when I can.

Always looking to save $$$ when your a public servant(teacher) in AZ. Plus no "mom and pop" shops here in the Phoenix, AZ area or none that don't have all bass fishing stuff. The Eppinger site is very good and I might try to buy some in bulk but need more of my group to go in with me. Have tried Ebay but most times they are the off brand DD.
